entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 20. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
